column2: title=Leaves from the Tree: J.R.R. Tolkien's Shorter Fiction

column1: '''''Leaves from the Tree: J.R.R. Tolkien's Shorter Fiction''''' is a collection of the proceedings of the 4th Tolkien Society Workshop, held in Beverley in 1989. It was published by [[The Tolkien Society]] in [[1991]] under the auspices of the [[Peter Roe Memorial Fund]] in [[1991]].

The publication is notable for including contributions from [[John Rateliff]], [[Christina Scull]] and [[Tom Shippey]]. In particular, [[Christina Scull]]'s paper, "Dragons from Andrew Lang's Retelling of Sigurd to Tolkien's Chrysophylax", reproduces an extract from Tolkien's unpublished lecture on dragons (see [[Lecture on Dragons]]).
